text:
e="preserve">Francesco Paolo Augusto Calì (; March 26, 1965 – March 13, 2019), known as "Frank" or "Franky Boy", was an American crime boss of the Gambino crime family. Cali was thought to have been the Gambinos' "ambassador to Sicilian mobsters" and had linked him to the Inzerillo Mafia family from Palermo. He was born in New York City.
Cali was killed outside his home in Staten Island on March 13, 2019, aged 53.
